name: ragcode
description: Semantic code navigation using RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) with multi-language support (Go, PHP, Python, JavaScript). Compatible with Windsurf, Cursor, Antigravity, Claude Desktop, and VS Code + GitHub Copilot (agent mode).

ollama.description: Local LLM for embeddings and chat

tools.name: get_function_details
tools.description: Get detailed information about a function or method

tools.name: find_type_definition
tools.description: Find the definition of a struct or interface

tools.name: get_code_context
tools.description: Extract code context for specific line ranges

tools.name: list_package_exports
tools.description: List exported symbols from a package

tools.name: find_implementations
tools.description: Find implementations and usages of a symbol

tools.name: index_workspace
tools.description: Manually trigger indexing of a workspace (auto-indexing is enabled by default)

QDRANT_COLLECTION.description: Qdrant collection name for code index

MCP_LOG_FILE.description: Path to log file for debugging (optional)
